title: Malwarebytes Anti-Malware Remediation Tool 1.75
description:
Traditional endpoint security can often miss zero-day threats, that's where Malwarebytes Anti-Malware Remediation Tool comes in. Anti-Malware Remediation Tool is a small portable application designed to detect and remove malware completely. It replaces hours of reimaging with quick remediation, using just a small dissolvable agant. Remediate the endpoint and there's nothing left behind. No Malware, no Malwarebytes. It's that efficient.


Features:

- You can deploy Malwarebytes Anti-Malware Remediation Tool via a shared network drive or from a USB. You can simply clean an infected endpoint without reimaging, economizing on the two elements most valuable to IT: time and money.

- Powerful heuristic scasnning engine

- Advanced malware remediation

- Fully scriptable

- Expanded Command Line Interface (CLI) support

- Headless CLI only)

- Seamless integration into existing IT frameworks

- Automated malware discoverty/remediation

- Ability to write log files to a central location

- Small dissolvable agent
